translations: v．属于，附属：与某事物有关联或从属关系。

sentences.sentence: The dairyman, who had thrown himself into abstraction to better realize the taste, and so divine the particular species of noxious weed to which it appertained, suddenly exclaimed
sentences.translation: 奶牛场老板聚精会神地在那儿品味着黄油的味道，想分辨出造成这种怪异味道的是一种什么莠草，过了一会儿他突然大声说
